codes.verbatim_quote: Ok, intanto io comincio dal warmup, quindi mi pare che fosse in localhost 5000, ok bene, carino
codes.context: User appreciates the aesthetic appearance of the homepage interface

codes.verbatim_quote: Allora, devo fare login? Sì, ok, quindi nella demo allora vediamo un po' con gli item che ci sono: volumi fruit science... ok quelle che le referenziano... risorse simili, ok container, nuovo record, time vault, journal article
codes.context: User naturally explores various system features and interface elements during warmup

codes.verbatim_quote: l'unico dubbio è effettivamente se la nuova entità sia necessaria o meno
codes.context: User expresses uncertainty about whether they need to create a new entity or if one already exists

codes.verbatim_quote: vedo che ce n'è già una praticamente, era già esistente in realtà
codes.context: User discovers that the entity already exists and expresses relief at this finding

codes.verbatim_quote: ok posso anche metterla come prima autrice, sì perfetto, e poi salvo le modifiche, penso di poter confermare, ok bene
codes.context: User confidently completes the first task after resolving the entity creation uncertainty

codes.verbatim_quote: devo andare alla pagina di Richard Carew
codes.context: User understands they need to navigate to Richard Carew's page for the merge task

codes.verbatim_quote: ci sono cose simili a queste, se si deve fare merge per caso. Allora ricerche, ricerche, ok, merge to site, ok, conferma
codes.context: User discovers and explores the merge functionality in the interface

codes.verbatim_quote: molto chiaro il fatto che ci sia il merge, capire anche chi è quello che perdi e chi è quello che mantieni
codes.context: User appreciates the clarity of the merge interface, particularly understanding which entity is kept and which is discarded

codes.verbatim_quote: Time Vault, ok non mi pare di aver capito bene come funziona
codes.context: User initially expresses confusion about how the Time Vault functionality works

codes.verbatim_quote: ah ok, time machine quindi lo snapshot effettivo che c'era, ah ok, perfetto
codes.context: User achieves understanding of the time machine concept as a snapshot system

codes.verbatim_quote: Intanto aggiungo il DOI, quindi il DOI, perfetto, quindi posso chiudere questo
codes.context: User successfully adds DOI information to the publication record

codes.verbatim_quote: aggiungo l'autore, il nome intero è quando non so, di Arcangelo Massari, sì, e metto l'identifier che usiamo, l'ORCID
codes.context: User methodically adds author information including ORCID identifier

codes.verbatim_quote: Beh capito se questo click mi mette di più una conferma o un qualcos'altro, sinceramente non capisco se devo cliccare lo stesso
codes.context: User expresses uncertainty about whether clicking buttons provides confirmation or triggers other actions

codes.verbatim_quote: publisher, add name, sì, poi pages starting page 340, poi publication date 2025, quindi 07-10-2025
codes.context: User systematically adds various metadata fields including publisher, pages, and publication date

codes.verbatim_quote: non sono fibre del fatto che l'abbia aggiunta
codes.context: User expresses uncertainty about whether they have successfully added an entity

codes.verbatim_quote: no è abbastanza chiaro, è molto semplice, sì, cioè è sempre molto semplice
codes.context: User consistently rates the system as clear and simple during questionnaire

codes.verbatim_quote: Sì l'unico problema è che non ho ben capito la questione della creazione dell'entità però tutto sommato va molto bene
codes.context: User identifies entity creation as the only major problem while rating the system positively overall

codes.verbatim_quote: la cross-referencing, sì c'è fatto already existing entities was complete
codes.context: User specifically appreciates the cross-referencing functionality for existing entities

codes.verbatim_quote: le entità sono salvate probabilmente, sì, questo è vero
codes.context: User believes that entities were probably saved despite the interface confusion

codes.verbatim_quote: mi sarebbe un po' piaciuto in più tipo anche avere un po' più di card, qualcosa che renda più chiaro il fatto che siamo quasi delle cose separate tra di loro
codes.context: User suggests wanting clearer visual separation between different elements, like cards, to make distinct sections more obvious

codes.verbatim_quote: It was effective in the tasks I was asked to perform.
codes.context: Overall evaluation of HERITRACE effectiveness in supporting assigned tasks from written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: I really liked the UI in general as it provided an easy way to navigate the data to input.
codes.context: User expressing satisfaction with the user interface design and navigation experience in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: Also I've noticed multiple warnings happening each time some data type was not the expected one
codes.context: User awareness of system validation feedback when incorrect data types are entered, noted in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: Referencing the already existing entities with the autocomplete functions was the most useful I think
codes.context: User identifying autocomplete functionality for existing entities as the most valuable feature in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: I found it a bit cumberson to add new entities on the fly while adding a resource.
codes.context: User expressing difficulty with the workflow for creating new entities during resource creation in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: There was not enough feedback nor I could see the entity being saved in real time.
codes.context: User identifying lack of visual feedback and real-time confirmation during entity creation process in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: Are the entities saved at the same time as the resource?
codes.context: User expressing confusion about when and how entities are persisted in the system in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: I think it would be useful to have a full preview of the resource before saving it.
codes.context: User suggesting improvement for reviewing complete resource data before final submission in written reflection

codes.verbatim_quote: Also I think more feedback when adding entities and more visual separation between the different sections
codes.context: User requesting improved visual feedback for entity creation and better section organization in written reflection
